subject: Re: My Boxes on the Show.
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Rob,

Good show! Thanks for sharing...

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "dead.science" <dead.science@...> wrote:
>
> Hi All:
> 
> I have built two working boxes and just did my show on them.  If your

> Rob.
